name: forum-mern-app
description: Fourm Web App Build using MERN stack

scripts.install: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix frontend"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend

author: Hari Prasad Pothuri
